subject: Tennis
Swiss Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: John Isner, the top seed and the defending champion, overcame a slow start to advance to the Atlanta Open semifinals, beating Marinko Matosevic, 7-6 (8), 6-4.
snippet: John Isner, the top seed and the defending champion, overcame a slow start to advance to the Atlanta Open semifinals, beating Marinko Matosevic, 7-6 (8), 6-4.
